entry.title: Kinktober 2025
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,400Chapters: 2/31Kudos: 41

Summary: Thirty-one days. Thirty-one prompts. Thirty-one kinks. A personal Kinktober challenge, to practice with smut writing, with also exploring different pairings across the DC and Marvel universes. Each chapter is a fic inspired by my own favorite dynamics. entry.title: love is nothing (i am yours)
entry.summary:
Author: peelingfruits

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,205Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 79

Summary: Bruce frowns, sucking his lower lip into his mouth in thought. Hal doesn’t even think before reaching his thumb out to stop him when he starts to chew off the skin, but Bruce’s eyes shoot open the moment he does it, darting up to Hal’s face. He aims to move his hand away, but before he manages, Bruce wraps his lips around the tip of Hal’s thumb, lifting his head a little to take the digit into his mouth.“Oh,” Hal breathes, his heart rabbiting in his chest. “You need something to keep your mouth busy, Spooky?”for kinktober 2025 day five: finger sucking

entry.title: To cage a star
entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 125,066Chapters: 35/64Kudos: 850

Summary: "Excuse me, um... I need to find someone, would you- would you mind helping me?"The lady who is asked is an old woman at a bus stop, with a warm expression on her face. "Yes, dear, who are you looking for?" "Um..." The little girl in the pale green dress reaches for her small purse and pulls out a carefully kept piece of paper to give the old lady. "His name is written on the back..." "And who may this person be to you, dear?" "My dad... Mom said Mr. Bruce Wayne is my dad."
